1254730.name: Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem - Original Extended Soundtrack
1254730.description:
Dive even deeper in the world of Wolcen: Lords of Mayhem through the high-quality Original Soundtrack, featuring Bosses, Maps and Events epic scoring in a 8-hours-long music journey.

In this package, you will have the very complete game OST including bonus tracks, ambient, dramatic, epic musics and cutscenes scores.

The 7h56 minutes of music (182 tracks), Including the Volume 1 (live-recorded with the City of Prague Philharmonic Orchestra and Four for Music Choirs and featuring solo artists) are available in 2 formats: Uncompressed MP3 (320kbps, 1.07Gb) and lossless FLAC (2,53Gb).

Composed and arranged by Cédric Baravaglio and Jean-Gabriel Raynaud
Live recordings : City of Prague Philharmonic Orchestra & Four for Music
Mixing : Robin Birner
Soloists : Roxane Genot (Cello), Jan Hoeglund (Violatar)
Orchestration : George Strezov & Four for Music, Nathan Einhorn, Marwan Piechaud
Mastering : Unique Horns Studios
